lexUnit.name: hungry.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: feeling a sensation of the body which (generally) signals the need for more food.

sentence.text: Hunger , caused by lack of food , is the most obvious and indeed the most powerful stimulus , but often we haven an appetite even though we are not very hungry .
